mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (bno, rname, rpwd, rcon, regdate, updatedate) VALUES (#{bno}, #{rname}, #{rpwd}, #{rcon}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE bno = #{bno}
SELECT rno, bno, rname, rpwd, rcon, regdate, updatedate FROM reply WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET rname = #{rname}, rcon = #{rcon}, updatedate = now() WHERE rno = #{rno} AND rpwd = #{rpwd}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reply WHERE rno = #{rno} AND rpwd = #{rpwd}
